mapper.delete: DELETE FROM blog_comment WHERE (parent_path LIKE CONCAT('', #{path},'%'))
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.parent_id,a.parent_path,a.content,a.module_type,a.module_id,a.comment_date,a.comment_status,a.comment_nickname,a.comment_email,a.comment_ip,a.comment_admin,a.comment_gravatar,a.comment_website,a.comment_editor FROM blog_comment a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_comment SET comment_status = #{status,javaType=CommentStatus,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.module_id,a.module_type,CONCAT(a.module_type,'_',a.module_id) AS module_sign,COUNT(*) AS comments FROM blog_comment a WHERE a.comment_status = 0 AND ( (a.module_type = #{module.module} AND a.module_id = #{module.id} ) ) GROUP BY a.module_type,a.module_id
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM blog_comment WHERE comment_gravatar = #{gravatar})
